text: Kɨ Kraisɨn adarazir mav gɨfo, God fomɨra, 14plan azenibar faragha, a inigha ghua namba 3 overiamɨn ghuavanabogha Godɨn Nguibamɨn oto. Kɨ fozir puvatɨ, a ti uan inivafɨzim sara ghu, o a uan inivafɨzim ategha duamɨn ghu. God uabɨra bizir kam gɨfo.12:2 Akar kam “Kraisɨn adarazir mav,” kar ti Pol uabɨ. Nɨ ves 7ɨn gan.
